name: Redead-ITA presents
description:
CONTROLS: 

  • ENTER for Start
  • SHIFT for Select
  • Z for A
  • X for B
  • ARROW KEYS for movement
 

This is a small game i made to take a stab on the whole game making in GB studio, you can check out some fun stuff i did, even if it's not the beautiful game ever.

if the game in the web browser doesn't load, you can try downloading it and play it in Firefox Mozilla or something

i am also not sure if this works on Mac and Linux, so i won't tick those boxes

Also yes the game as no music, feel free to put your own for fun.
